meanings.sent1: I need to rerecord my favorite song because it got deleted.
meanings.sent2: She decided to rerecord the interview to improve the sound quality.
meanings.sent3: Tom had to rerecord his speech after his cat meowed loudly in the background.
meanings.sent4: The artist wanted to rerecord the song to capture the raw emotion better.
meanings.sent5: After the mistake, the singer had to rerecord the chorus to get it just right.

meanings.definition: To make a new recording of something
meanings.sent1: Let's rerecord this message so it sounds clearer.
meanings.sent2: They had to rerecord the podcast episode due to technical issues.
meanings.sent3: The parrot learned to rerecord the owner's voice saying 'I love you'.
meanings.sent4: The historian decided to rerecord the ancient tale for future generations.
meanings.sent5: In order to fix the error, the team had to rerecord the entire presentation.
